i1.blurb: After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage. Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.
description: {{sbc|Frost Armor:}} '''Sejuani''' receives [[File:Sejuani Frost Armor.png|18px|link=]] ''Frost Armor'' if she hasn't taken damage from large [[monster]]s and enemy [[champion]]s in the last 12 seconds, lingering for 3 seconds after taking damage.

[[File:Sejuani Frost Armor.png|18px|link=]] ''Frost Armor'' engulfs {{ui|Bristle}} in True Ice, becoming [[Slow resist#Slow Immunity|immune]] to {{tip|slow|slows}} and gains {{sti|armor|{{as|20 (+ 25% '''bonus''' armor) '''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|20 (+ 25% '''bonus''' magic resistance) '''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}.

{{sbc|Icebreaker:}} Enemies {{tip|stun|stunned}} by '''Sejuani''' are ''Frozen''. '''Sejuani's''' basic attacks and abilities against ''Frozen'' enemies consume the effect to deal {{as|{{pp|3|10 to 20|1;7;14|key=%}} of their '''maximum''' health}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}, capped to 300 against epic monsters.
i1.name: Fury of the North

q1.blurb: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sejuani''' signals {{ui|Bristle}} to {{tip|dash}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} all enemies hit for {{fd|0.5}} seconds. The charge will prematurely end upon colliding with an enemy [[champion]].
q1.name: Arctic Assault
notes: * Champions will slightly be {{tip|airborne|knocked back}}, while [[minion]]s and [[monster]]s will instead be slightly {{tip|airborne|pulled}} for a fixed distance.

w1.blurb: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|0.25}}-seconds delay, '''Sejuani''' swings her flail in a cone in the target direction, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to all enemies hit and {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} minions and monsters.

She then lashes out with her flail after {{fd|0.75}} seconds in a straight line in the same direction, dealing additional {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies hit by 75% for {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
'''Sejuani''' can move freely during ''Winter's Wrath''. Both swings will strike in the cast direction, but their hitboxes follow '''Sejuani's''' movement.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 40}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|(+ 2% of her '''maximum''' health)}}}}

{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|30 to 190}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|5.25}}% of her '''maximum''' health)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|20+30 to 40+190}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|7.25}}% of her '''maximum''' health)}}}}
w1.name: Winter's Wrath
notes: * {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block only a single instance of damage - either the swing or the lash.
* The ability's cooldown starts after both flail attacks are completed.

e1.blurb: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} {{ai|Winter's Wrath|Sejuani}} and both '''Sejuani's''' and {{tt|nearby|1100 range}} allied {{tip|melee}} champions' basic attacks apply ''Frost'' to enemy champions, epic, large and medium monsters, super minions and siege minions for 5 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.
{{sbc|Active:}} If the targeted enemy has 4 stacks of ''Frost'', '''Sejuani''' consumes all stacks to deal {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|knockdown|knock them down}}, and {{tip|stun}} them for 1 second.
Enemy champions {{tip|stun|stunned}} by '''Sejuani''' cannot gain ''Frost'' for {{pp|3|10 to 8|1;7;14}} seconds.
e1.name: Permafrost

r1.blurb: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sejuani''' throws a True Ice bola in the target direction, stopping at the first enemy champion hit, dealing {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|knockdown|knocking them down}}, and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for 1 second.

The bola deals increased damage, {{tip|stun|stuns}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds and shatters upon reaching maximum range or upon colliding with a unit beyond {{tt|400 range|estimated}}, creating a storm for 2 seconds that {{tip|slow|slows}} enemies by 30%.
At the end of the duration the storm shatters the ground, dealing the same damage and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies by 80% for 1 second.
The enemy hit by the bola is not affected by the storm's effects.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|100 to 150}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Empowered Magic Damage|{{ap|150 to 350}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
r1.name: Glacial Prison
notes: * ''Glacial Prison'' affects minions only if they are within detonation radius.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block only a single instance of damage.
* The {{tip|stun}} will apply {{tip|single target}} spell effect, while the storm will apply {{tip|area of effect}} spell damage.
* The True Ice bola is always thrown at maximum range.
* The True Ice bola does not collide with terrain.
* The True Ice bola applies the freeze immunity of {{ai|Permafrost|Sejuani}} when {{tip|stun|stunning}} a champion.
